name: adobe-cfml-lsp
description: Extension to help ColdFusion developers to manage projects, debug code, scan files for vulnerabilities and much more.
author: Microsoft Corporation

commands.title: Toggle between decimal and hex formatting

program.description: Absolute path to a text file.
